actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain gloves and trousers which incorporate protective features designed specifically for use in forestry.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to permit the importation free of duty of certain gloves and trousers designed for use in forestry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment for certain gloves and trousers which incorporate protective features designed specifically for use in forestry.
